name: camofox-mcp
description: Anti-detection browser automation MCP server. 41 tools wrapping CamoFox REST API with stealth fingerprinting that passes bot detection.

environment_variables.name: CAMOFOX_HTTP_PORT
environment_variables.description: HTTP server port for Streamable MCP transport

environment_variables.name: CAMOFOX_PROFILES_DIR
environment_variables.description: Custom profiles directory for session persistence

tools.name: batch_click
tools.description: Click multiple elements sequentially. Continues on error (clicks are independent). Returns per-click results.

tools.name: camofox_close_session
tools.description: Close all browser tabs for a user session. Use for complete cleanup when done with a browsing session.

tabId.description: Any tab ID from the session to identify the user

tools.name: camofox_evaluate_js
tools.description: Execute JavaScript in the browser page context. Runs in isolated scope (invisible to page scripts — safe for anti-detection). Use for: extracting data not visible in accessibility snapshot, checking element properties, reading computed styles, manipulating DOM elements. Requires CAMOFOX_API_KEY to be configured.

tools.name: camofox_hover
tools.description: Hover over an element to trigger tooltips, dropdown menus, or hover states. Use ref from snapshot or CSS selector.

tools.name: camofox_press_key
tools.description: Press a keyboard key. Use after type_text to submit forms (Enter), navigate between elements (Tab), move through suggestions (ArrowDown/ArrowUp), or dismiss dialogs (Escape). Common keys: Enter, Tab, Escape, ArrowDown, ArrowUp, Backspace, Space.

tools.name: camofox_scroll_element
tools.description: Scroll a specific container element (modal dialog, scrollable div, sidebar). Use when page-level scroll doesn't reach content inside modals or overflow containers. Returns scroll position metadata to track progress.

tools.name: camofox_scroll_element_and_snapshot
tools.description: Scroll a container element AND take a snapshot. Combines scroll_element + snapshot in one call. Perfect for incrementally loading lazy content in modals (e.g. Facebook group post comments). Returns both scroll position and page snapshot.

tools.name: camofox_wait_for
tools.description: Wait for page to be fully ready (DOM loaded, network idle, framework hydration complete). Use after navigation or actions that trigger page changes.

tools.name: camofox_wait_for_text
tools.description: Wait for specific text to appear on the page. Useful for waiting for search results, form submissions, or dynamic content loading.

tools.name: click
tools.description: Click an element. Provide either ref (from snapshot) or CSS selector. Use snapshot first to discover element refs.

tools.name: close_tab
tools.description: Close a browser tab and release resources. Always close tabs when done to free memory.

tools.name: create_tab
tools.description: Create a new browser tab with anti-detection fingerprinting. Each tab gets a unique fingerprint. Optionally provide a URL and userId for session isolation. Returns the tab ID for subsequent operations.

tools.name: delete_download
tools.description: Delete a downloaded file from disk and registry

tools.name: fill_form
tools.description: Fill multiple form fields in one call. Provide an array of field entries, each with a ref or CSS selector and the text to type. Optionally specify a submit button to click after filling.

tools.name: batch_download
tools.description: Extract resources from a DOM container and download them all. Combines extract_resources + download in one call. Useful for downloading all images from a chat, all PDFs from a table, etc.

tools.name: extract_resources
tools.description: Extract resources (images, links, media, documents) from a specific DOM container. Use a CSS selector or element ref from snapshot to scope extraction to a particular section of the page. This is useful for extracting all images from a specific post, all links from a table, etc.

tools.name: get_download
tools.description: Get a downloaded file. Images are always returned as viewable images. Recommended for AI agents: set includeContent=true to get non-image file content as base64 inline (max 256KB). Otherwise returns metadata only (including contentUrl).

tools.name: get_links
tools.description: Get all hyperlinks on page with URLs and text. Useful for navigation discovery and site mapping.

tools.name: get_stats
tools.description: Get session statistics: request counts, active tabs, uptime, performance metrics.

tools.name: go_back
tools.description: Navigate backward in browser history (Back button). Returns new page URL.

tools.name: go_forward
tools.description: Navigate forward in browser history (Forward button). Returns new page URL.

tools.name: import_cookies
tools.description: Import cookies for authenticated sessions. Provide cookies as JSON string array. Restores login sessions without re-auth. Requires userId.

tools.name: list_presets
tools.description: List all available geo presets supported by the CamoFox server. Presets include locale, timezone, and optional geolocation.

tools.name: list_downloads
tools.description: List downloaded files with optional filtering by tab, status, extension, MIME type, and size range. Each download includes contentUrl for direct file retrieval.

tools.name: save_profile
tools.description: Export cookies from an active tab and save them to a named session profile on disk.

tools.name: load_profile
tools.description: Load a named session profile from disk and import its cookies into a tab's browser session.

tools.name: list_profiles
tools.description: List saved session profiles with basic metadata.

tools.name: delete_profile
tools.description: Delete a saved session profile from disk.

tools.name: list_tabs
tools.description: List all open browser tabs with URLs and titles. Use to discover available tabs or verify tab state.

tools.name: navigate
tools.description: Navigate a tab to a URL. Waits for page load. Use create_tab first, then navigate. Returns final URL (may differ due to redirects).

tools.name: navigate_and_snapshot
tools.description: Navigate to a URL and return the page snapshot. Combines navigate + wait + snapshot into one call.

tools.name: refresh
tools.description: Reload the current page. Useful when page state is stale or after changes.

tools.name: screenshot
tools.description: Take visual screenshot as base64 PNG. Use ONLY for visual verification (CSS, layout, proof). Prefer snapshot for most tasks — much more token-efficient.

tools.name: scroll
tools.description: Scroll page up or down by pixel amount. Use to reveal content below the fold or navigate long pages.

tools.name: scroll_and_snapshot
tools.description: Scroll the page and take a snapshot. Useful for revealing content below the fold.

tools.name: server_status
tools.description: Check CamoFox server health and browser connection. Call first to verify server is running. Returns version, browser status, and active tab count.

tools.name: snapshot
tools.description: Get accessibility tree snapshot — the PRIMARY way to read page content. Returns element refs, roles, names and values. Token-efficient. Always prefer over screenshot. Element refs are used with click and type_text.

tools.name: resolve_blobs
tools.description: Resolve blob: URLs to downloadable base64 data. Blob URLs are temporary browser objects (common in Telegram, WhatsApp, Discord) that cannot be downloaded directly. This tool converts them to base64 data URIs.

tools.name: type_and_submit
tools.description: Type text into a field and press a key (default: Enter). Useful for search boxes and single-field forms.

tools.name: type_text
tools.description: Type text into an input field. Provide either a ref (from snapshot) or a CSS selector. Use ref when available; use selector as fallback when snapshot doesn't assign refs (common with combobox/autocomplete inputs). Call snapshot first to find target element.

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Search the web via 14 engines: google, youtube, amazon, bing, duckduckgo, reddit, github, stackoverflow, wikipedia, twitter, linkedin, facebook, instagram, tiktok. Call snapshot after to read results.
